Product name: Eyelash and Eyebrow Growth Serum and makeup remover! Comes in easy application glide roller balls! It's my #1 Top Seller for a reason.
Description:
MY #1 Top Selling Product! Available in a New Roller ball method! Great for travel! Scroll through my pictures to view applicators and customers successful before and after pics! Watch my U-tube Tutorial Videos to see how I use my eyelash serum!
(ADDED to new Ingredients To Boost your Growth! #1 Horsetail Extract & Marshmallow Root Oil)! 
Directions
Make sure to remove all eye make-up before bed then apply a nice coat of my special formula on your eyelashes and waterline or lash line and make sure to get close to the roots. You can rub serum gently all over your with your fingers with your eyes shut.  These amazing ingredients help fine lines so it's ok to rub all over eye and under eye it's a good recipe!  Sleep with it on your lashes all night while you sleep and dream of them becoming sexier and more dramatic. 
In the morning remove the treatment with a gentle cleanser or it will come off in the shower when you wash your Beautiful face. I will send a couple Mascara Wands to you and  samples of my other amazing products!  Thank You in advance for your interest and purchase!! Please leave me a review because i want to know how this worked for you!! Good Luck!!
Welcome to the most popular eyelash growth Serum on Etsy! I can't make this fast enough!! Everyone loves it because it works!! I am so happy I am helping people with this recipe!!  You get a lot for your  on this serum a little bit goes a long way and it's great for your cuticles and you can apply this serum on your scalp! Anywhere you need Hair Growth it will work!  Check out my Ingredients  and my 3 Boosters Biotin and GenTeal which has Mineral Oil and Petroleum and lanolin and i add The Amazing Emu Oil. That's what makes my serum different and i really Hope it works for you like it's working for 99% of my customer base. It's the Boosters that help! Biotin and GenTeal Lubricant Mineral oil and Petroleum and Emu Oil are the 3 key Ingredients..the rest are great too but we need a Power Boost! Stick with it and you will see results! I Provide you with the tools to apply i send you the Wands to apply and you can use your fingers too. wash your hands first my Lovely ladies. Read On to learn more about this Fab Lash and brow Serum! Best to apply at Night because it is Oily so let the magic happen at Night while you sleep. 
*Make sure you Watch my Demo Video on U-Tube on how to apply my Magic Serum! I get asked all the time how do I apply the serum..well here is how I apply my serum! Just copy & Paste this link to your search engine box on top of your Computer screen or in U-tubes search box or just type my name Frankie Belmain..hopefully you will find it..if not message me and i will send you link Sweethearts! :D Copy and Paste this link to your search bar        https://youtu.be/fwb7dh7FCRE <<<  All my Videos here    https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLeSUrNDwxjHebB8d1MYj0hwX0RAbuES3r  
This is how i actually got started in making Organic Beauty Products! I was addicted to high end Mascaras that could make your eyelashes look Extra thick and Long! I tried exspensive Products and got tired of paying so much money. So i was searching for products that made my eyelashes LONG that i could afford and make myself and came across some recipes on Pinterest and after researching and testing i came up with this concoction. The Biotin is a definite Booster and the GenTeal lubricant is a double Booster on top of the amazing Oils already in this recipe. I have tried just about everything out there and this recipe Rocks! You have to stick with it and you will see results.  Take a before and after picture of your eyelashes. Great for eyebrows too! I have to trim my eyebrows because this potion makes them grow like weeds! 
Ingredients:
Biotin
Mineral Oil and Petroleum and lanolin is the only ingredient that is not organic but it gives the serum such an amazing Lash & Brow Boost of Hair growth!! Please specify if you do not wish to have this added to your Serum but it helps.

This magic Eyelash Serum really Works! I make it with high end Organic Hair stimulating Ingredients because i want it to work faster. You apply it on your eyelashes and the water line of your eye at night before you go to bed and let it do it's magic while you sleep! You will see results in about 2 to 3 weeks everyone has different body chemistry so u may see results sooner. This is a inexpensive way to grow your eyelashes and eyebrows! You will LOVE this Serum! The essential oils help smooth out fine lines and wrinkles too..so it's a win a win!
Disclaimer: I am by no means a medical expert or a Doctor or esthetician . These home remedies are based on my own research, opinions, likes, and experiences. skin, anti-inflammatory

Dark Circles
Vaselline -  Vaseline® Jelly is triple-filtered, ensuring it is truly free from impurities. This means that is often used to protect and repair the skin. Moms love it for preventing diaper rash, but it can also be used to protect minor cuts and burns, to soften skin, and to lock in moisture in dry, cracked skin. Vaseline® Jelly works from the inside out, repairing and protecting dry skin and locking in moisture, making your skin feel and look good!
Beeswax: Locks in moisture, protects skin against damaging elements, antioxidant,
anti-bacterial, and anti-inflammatory
Vitamin E oil: Antioxidant, natural moisturizer, anti-inflammatory, helps preserve shelf
life of lotion

Product name: Stretch Mark Cream handmade with Pure High Quality Organic butters waxes and essential Oils. You will see Results. Helps fade scars too!
Description:
For best results I recommend exfoliating in the shower first to remove dead skin build up then get out of shower  lightly dry off your skin and while is skin is still damp then apply my Stretch mark Cream to stretch marks or all over body. I make a blood orange body polish to exfoliate. here is link    
https://www.etsy.com/listing/257548622/blood-orange-body-polish-polish-away?ref=shop_home_active_43
WHAT IS A STRETCH MARK??
Stretch Marks form when the skin is stretched very quickly.  Stretch marks are most common in growing teenagers and pregnant women.  Basically when the skin stretches it begins to rip and forms a scar.  
This homemade stretch mark cream contains ingredients that are fabulous for your skin including coconut oil, cocoa butter, and vitamin E oil and more. The cocoa butter in this homemade stretch mark cream is a natural moisturizer with amazing properties. For example, it is rich in antioxidants that can help heal scars, scratches, and yes, stretch marks. Seeing is believing and you will see! I am happy with my personal results i have a Big Ugly scar and stretch marks on my lower stomach area and they used to be a medium brown color but now it's clear with a pink tint. It's really almost invisible. Take a before and picture to see your results. Good Luck to You my friends. 
Additional Tip to get Better faster results! - Is to EXFOLIATE First if you can...like Exfoliate when your in the Shower and when you get out and you are still damp then apply my Stretch Mark Cream. You will get better faster results. Your still going to fade your stretch marks but this is a good additional step if you can. otherwise just keep applying Cream as much as you can. What you put into it you will surely get back! Excited to see how you do...please let me know.  
My skin has improved so much since i started using my Body Butters especially Body Butters with essential Oils that target scars, stretch marks and problem areas. I really do get compliments on my legs and skin now! My husband said i looked more defined and i am not working out so it has to be the Body Butters and my friend told me i had nice legs! I loved it! lol Like with anything you have to stick with it to get great results and i honestly apply Body Butter to my skin all day long when i am at Home because I am always making these wonderful products so i do have an advantage in being able to apply this on my body all day. My Skin has never looked so good! Thank You Mother nature.  I LOVE IT! 
Neroli- and i love the smell of this amazing oil.
Beeswax
Coconut Oil
cocoa butter
Vitamin E	
lavender essential oil
frankincense essential oil
Helichrysum
Lemon
sweet almond Oil
Wheat Germ Essential Oil
Aloe Vera Gel
INGREDIENTS
Neroli Essential Oil is a powerful oil that helps reduce the appearance of stretch marks and scars, it is cicatrisant which means it has anti scarring properties!  Neroli oil also stimulates circulation and encourages cell regeneration!
Helichrysum Essential Oil is an expensive oil but it is powerful when it comes to regenerating damaged skin.  It is known for fading and healing scars and stretch marks and even surgical wounds (C-sections scars!).   It contains diketones which help reduce scar tissue and stimulate growth of new skin tissue!  This is one powerful essential oil!
Lavender Essential Oil is healing and calming.  It also nourishes broken, cracked skin.
Lemon Essential Oil can lighten the appearance of scars and stretch marks.
Vitamin E Oil is moisturizing and highly nourishing.  It also prolongs the life of your butter.
Sweet Almond Oil contains vitamins A and E.  It contains a large amount of antioxidants which help skin appear younger.
Coconut Oil is extremely healing. It is full of antioxidants and Vitamin E.
Cocoa Butter is famous for protecting the skin from stretch marks.  It is highly nourishing and penetrates to the lower epidermis of the skin.
Shea Butter helps rebuild collagen which is broken down when the skin ages or becomes damaged.
Beeswax thickens your butter as well as provides a protective barrier that holds moisture in the skin.
I know what it feels like to have your skin stretch and stretch and stretch!  I’m willing to admit that I’m vain.  I had many moments where worry and fear took over.  It seemed at times that my skin was going to just rip.  Not to mention the itchy discomfort.  I faithfully used a body butter to relieve the discomfort and to reduce the risk of stretch marks and this helped to ease my mind significantly.  The thing about stretch marks is that you can reduce the risk of getting them by keeping the skin well hydrated and nourished but heredity plays a big roll.  If your mom has stretch marks from pregnancy you most likely will too.  The good news is that you can easily relieve your skin from the discomfort of stretching and at the same time you can fade and hopefully prevent stretch marks!  I believe 100% that you must protect and “feed” your skin during this precious and trying time!  Itchy skin caused from a growing belly needs to be hydrated and protected at least once daily.  The ingredients I’ve chosen are safe and beneficial for you and your growing baby. Or if you just want to heal scars any have nice skin...you don't have to have stretch marks to enjoy this Recipe! :)

These make beautiful wedding shower gifts, wedding gifts, or anniversary gifts. Brides often like to display these pillows at their wedding showers and wedding receptions and then display them in their new home as a beautiful reminder of their wedding day. Each wedding pillow is professionally printed with natural water-based pigments on a soft linen blend fabric.
